mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_usage (user_sid, year, month, used_count, updated_at) VALUES (#{userSid}, #{year}, #{month}, 1, now()) ON CONFLICT (user_sid, year, month) DO UPDATE SET used_count = ai_usage.used_count + 1, updated_at = now()

INSERT INTO ai_usage (user_sid, year, month, used_count, bonus_count, updated_at) VALUES (#{userSid}, #{year}, #{month}, 0, #{amount}, now()) ON CONFLICT (user_sid, year, month) DO UPDATE SET bonus_count = ai_usage.bonus_count + #{amount}, updated_at = now()
